Name: Z Mutants
About the game: Something is happening in town. People are going crazy attacking each other. Can you survive to find out what's causing this insanity? Who's behind this zombie outbreak? 10 levels of FPS horror action await! Find notes and documents to reveal the mystery. Find hidden keys to progress. Shoot your way through the zombie mutant hoard and survive.
